> Well hello there group. Your probably wondering where the hell 
I've 
> been. Ya see, I'm in the process of moving and my internet has 
been 
> cut off, as well as cable tv...*sigh* Anyway I havn't been able to 
> get on and do anything in any RPG, forum or anything else I'm 
> involved with online. I'm only on now because I managed to get on 
a 
> friends comp. Hopefully I'll be online soon after the move. It's 
> going to be a few weeks though. If you havn't done something 
already

I
